default.title: Emergency Exits Inspection
default.subtitle: Verify that all emergency exits are accessible, unobstructed, and clearly marked.
checklist: Exit doors open easily without keys or special tools

default.title: First Aid and Medical Supplies
default.subtitle: Ensure that first aid kits and emergency medical supplies are stocked and accessible.
checklist: First aid kits stocked according to regulations
AED (Automated External Defibrillator) available and functional
Emergency contact numbers posted in visible areas

default.title: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) Compliance
default.subtitle: Check that all required PPE is available and being worn correctly by personnel.
checklist: Hard hats worn in required areas
High-visibility vests available for site access
Safety gloves and eyewear used where necessary

school.title: Fire Protection Equipment Check
school.subtitle: Check all extinguishers, sprinklers, and fire alarms in classrooms, hallways, and staff areas.
checklist: Fire extinguisher inspection date is valid

school.title: Accessibility Facility Verification
school.subtitle: Ensure all entrances, restrooms, and common areas comply with accessibility standards.

school.title: Playground Safety Audit
school.subtitle: Inspect outdoor play areas for hazards and compliance with safety standards.
checklist: No sharp edges or broken components

apartment.title: Fire Safety Inspection
apartment.subtitle: Inspect fire alarms, exits, and extinguishers in all units and hallways.
checklist: Smoke detectors in each unit are functional
Fire extinguishers checked within last 12 months
Emergency exit signage is visible and lit

apartment.title: Elevator Safety and Maintenance
apartment.subtitle: Ensure elevators are functioning properly and comply with safety regulations.

apartment.title: Structural Integrity Review
apartment.subtitle: Check common areas and units for any visible structural damage.
checklist: No visible cracks in load-bearing walls

commercial.title: Freight Circulation Check
commercial.subtitle: Ensure loading/unloading areas and paths are clear and compliant.

commercial.title: Electrical System Safety Review
commercial.subtitle: Inspect electrical rooms and systems for compliance and hazard prevention.

commercial.title: Workplace Hazard Assessment
commercial.subtitle: Review work areas for potential hazards and ensure compliance with occupational safety regulations.
